name: Food Dice
description:
Food Ice is a food platformer where you are a dice and every 15 seconds, based on which face you land on, you get special effects.

Keys to use:

  • A-D / Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • M to toggle minimap
  • K to kill yourself
  • P to pause/resume
  • L to reload the level

Try to beat your highscore time and get all the coins!

Made with java without a game engine for the GMTK Game jam 2022.
